article_title: 'They were heroes,' says Sunak of killed aid workers.
sentence: 'They  were  heroes,'  says  Sunak  of  killed  aid  workers.

article_title: 'They were heroes,' says Sunak of killed aid workers.
sentence: Rishi  Sunak  moves  on  to  pay  tribute  to  the  three  British  aid  workers  who  were  killed  in  Gaza,  naming  them  as  John  Chapman,  James  Kirby  and  James  Henderson.
